name: The Wizard & The Dragon
description:
The Wizard and The Dragon is an interactive narrative that intends to place the player in a typical fantasy setting and plot, then subvert their expectations with goofy twists and imagery. As the player explores their surroundings, hidden secrets will become revealed. Collects items and watch them get added to an inventory. Choose from a wide selection of actions to embody your true magical abilities as the Wizard.
